title: Leysdown Coastal Park Walking Route

images.title: PAUL FARMER / Car Park at Leysdown Coastal Park
images.caption: Car Park at Leysdown Coastal Park. The car park is off of Shellness Road. The coastal park consists of 45 acres of unspoiled greenery and 1.2 km of unspoilt beach, half of which is a site of special scientific interest.

images.title: PAUL FARMER / Coastal Defences at Leysdown Coastal Park
images.caption: Shellness Road approaching Leysdown Coastal Park.

images.title: Danny Robinson, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Shellness Road approaching the Coastal Park

images.title: Phillip Perry / Coastal Park, Leysdown
images.caption: Grassland and sea view at the park

description: Enjoy fabulous views of the Thames Estuary on this circular walk through Leysdon Coastal park and Leysdon Marshes on the Isle of Sheppey . For cyclists please see the Isle of Harty Trail which also runs through the park.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: Head north towards Sheerness and you can visit Barton's Point Coastal Park. There's more nice trails here and a pretty lake. You can also pick up the Sheerness Way here.

display_address: Shellness Road, Leysdown, Leysdown-on-Sea, Swale, Kent, England, ME12 4QX, United Kingdom
